movie.title: Beverly Hills Cop 1
movie.description: Detroit Cop travels to Beverly Hill to investigate friends murder
movie.title: Beverly Hills Cop 2
movie.description: Detroit Cop travels to Beverly Hill for second time to investigate a crime organization who shot his friend
movie.title: Beverly Hills Cop 3
movie.description: Detroit Cop travels to Beverly Hill to investigate counterfeiting operation at amusement park
movie.title: Trading Places
movie.description: Savy street scam artist trades places with prestigious stock broker and vice versa in an ill conceived social experiment
